import { transformPost } from "../transformers";
export const getPosts = (page, limit) => fetch(`http://localhost:3005/posts?_page=${page}&_limit=${limit}`).then(loadedPosts => Promise.all([loadedPosts.json(), loadedPosts.headers.get('Link')])).then(loadedPosts => loadedPosts && loadedPosts.map(transformPost));
